values: shell casings still litter the floor, fingerprints in blood stains remain on the door, this is the aftermath, of what happens when a bastard snaps, now imagine that, just hours ago i was parked out back, waitin for the right time to start the attack, i cut the phone line on the side of the house, walked around front took all the tires out, just in case something goes wrong, but i have no doubts, there shouldn't be any survivors walkin out, back around the house through the bathroom window, here's where i quietly made my intro, violently about to make somebody a widow, put my ear to the door and listen, sounds like three dudes playin cards in the kitchen, so without hesitation, kicked open the door and began the devistation, one reached for his piece, but he was slow on the draw, he took two to the chest and one to the jaw, the other two never had a chance to make it, someone gave them life, and i was here to take it, i heard a girl scream from the other room, damn!  almost forgot there was another dude, creeped up slowly to the bedroom door, yelled, "come out with your hands up, and i won't kill the whore", the girl came out first, scared and naked, the man said, "all the money's in the safe, just take it", i ain't here for the money, i ain't here for your wife, you can call me the reaper cause i'm here for your life, we warned you about what would happen if you opened your mouth son, now open up your mouth so you can swallow this shotgun, he smiled, i guess he figured, i didn't look like one who could pull the trigger, well, have you ever seen a head explode, after takin a sawed off to the frontal lobe, i stared at the mess on the floor, told the girl to get dressed and head for the door, she couldn't take it no more, started crying, so i wasted the whore, it's nothing personal, just business, besides it's not professional to leave a witness

I stepped into the place, black dudes all in my face, thinkin that they thuggin, straight mean muggin, cause they down on my race. Ain't no way a caucasian, can cause devistation, so without hesitation, i grabbed up a mic and straight started blazin. i told them all it was needless to battle, i leave 'em cryin like Meg Ryan from sleepless in seattle, so go tell your crew how i made your head rattle, and how you couldn't manage to get up from, all the damage that had been done, and though you tried to plan it, you couldn't predict the outcome,face it you were outdone, ain't no fun being out-gunned by someone that you shunned, and in all this confusion, i abuse them, leave their egos battered and bruised and, the whole crowd gets to witness a firsthand execution.
so, a friend told me of his father being diagnosed with prostate cancer.. without hesitation I replied, "wow! that must be a real pain in the ass."

My resolutions for next year are as follows...
1. Lie to an entire country, for personal and political gain
2. Start a war on false information, once again mainly for personal reasons
3. Tell the families of fallen soldiers, that their loved ones died a noble death protecting America against the terrorists and terroristic threats, When in reality I'm just using them as pawns in my sick game to gain control of the world's oil supply
4. Take it upon myself to play God, and basically decline all gay unions any recognition in mainstream America, because it goes against my personal beliefs
5. While I'm playing God, I may as well tell women, that they no longer have the right to make any decision involving abortion. Once again, seeing how this goes against my personal and religious beliefs, I should just go ahead and make it illegal
6. Recommend someone, who is "currently" in violation of several Illegal Immigrant Laws, to be the next in line to head up the Homeland Security Council
7. Do my best to offend any Allies we may have, God forbid we have any other countries on our side
8. Use smoke screen tactics, like empty promises for changes in the economy and health care, to shadow the war, and the huge debt it will leave on tax payers
9. Hold my firm stance on terrorism, and pat myself on the back for a job well-done, While the "real" head of world terrorism hides in a cave and laughs at me through video messages
10. Last but not least. Dumb it down. Mispronounce a few words here and there, sound more like an uneducated 2nd cousin, than an elected official.
worst case scenerio, they think I'm too stupid to be held responsible for my actions

Now, if I follow these resolutions to a tee. I too could be chosen as Time's, "Man of the Year"

Past recipients such as Gandhi, Kennedy, or even Nelson Mandela, would be appalled and probably ashamed to share a list with this year's winner, our "honest and most upstanding of Presidents", Mr. G.W. Bush.

so let me paint the picture for you.. Celebration Hotel. Hosting the Christmas party for Kate's company. more or less, a lot of uppity rich people, drinking themselves into retardation, mingling with co-workers, and enjoying the night. Crowded ball room, full of people dancing and laughing.. music playing.. (enter Justin) I escorted Kate to the middle of the floor, sat her in a chair, and asked the DJ to kill the music as he handed me the mic. I asked everyone for their attention, and then proceeded to read the following.. something I had wrote earlier in the day...

I know that you hate it
cause I don't often say it
But my day doesn't start without you

I know I don't show it
But I need you to know it
The only thing in my heart, Kate, is you

When people make you mad
and life leaves you sad
I'll be that shoulder you need

And when times get rough
cause they're bound to get tough
I'll be there to watch you succeed

As our time grows longer
My love just grows stronger
I'll feel this way til they bury me

Cause I knew that first day
That eventually I'd say
Kate, will you marry me

as I read the last line, I slipped down to one knee, and removed the ring from my pocket.. just that moment, the room erupted with applause and screams..cameras were flashing, chicks were teary eyed.. and Kate was speechless. Her eyes flowed over with tears of joy, as she fought to catch her breath. I actually took her breath away. Between the tears and attempts to catch her breath, she was able to softly mumble, "yes". I took her in my arms, hugged and kissed her.. as a thunderous applause echoed all around us. As one girl told me later.. it was like something from movie, too perfect to be real. The rest of the night was spent shaking hands of those wishing to congratulate us... for a few hours tonight, I felt on top of the world. Guys and girls alike, most of which I had never met, came to commend me on the way I proposed..tonight, I impressed myself.. I went above and beyond anything I had envisioned...  when I saw the joy in her eyes as I placed the ring on her finger,I knew for that brief moment, that I had achieved perfection. This was, by far, the best night of my life.

Tonight is Kate's Christmas party down at Celebration. I plan on making it a night everyone will remember..hopefully everything goes according to plan, if so, this will go down as one of the greatest nights of mine and Kate's life. I can't discuss details at this moment. for 2 reasons. A. she could read this. or B. by talking about it, I'll just jinx myself. Be sure to tune in tomorrow to catch the exciting conclusion of "the Christmas party". which can ONLY be found here, in my journal. Untill I sell the story to the highest bidding network to be turned into a made-for-tv movie. With my luck UPN will get it, and cast Bubba Sparxx as me.

you couldn't keep up, if i was two steps behind you
lemme press rewind so that i can remind you
my rhymes are communistic, and i'm an ill dictator
why'd ya even try to battle with this master debator
the color commentator
in the equation of a hater
i'm the common denominator
back on the block, bumpin hip-hop
pimpin pearly white socks with my flip-flops
have the world in shock when my hits drop
put the game on lock, til i hit stop
no need to lie, i thought i told ya
i can never die, cause i'm a mother fuckin soldier
i got my ammo laced up, i'm camo'd from the waist up
in case we ever face up, i'm fuckin your whole place up
ain't nothing nice about me
think about it twice and continue to doubt me
i could burn vanilla ice, at the icecream stand
i'll be the first to make Eminem melt in my hand
oops.. (you mean M&M.) No. i mean him. white boy, kinda slim
goes by Eminem..
tell the truth, here's your chance
it's not that he don't dance, 
he just can't
cause there's a white boy in his pants
i know, cause i tried it once when i was young
they said boy you're white, and you just look dumb

Here we are, the 21st of September. Which just so happens to be the same day that marks the 26th year of my existence. 26 years ago today, a 9lb. 8oz. boy was born. Anyways, I don't feel any different than I did yesterday. But then again, I see no reason why I should. In a few short hours this day will have passed, much like the last 16 years of my life, quiet and uneventful. 

I wouldn't say it's been a "great" birthday. My knee is a wreck, and sitting around the house for the 6th straight day, isn't what I would call " a fun time". Kate's been great though, came through with some NFL2K for the PS2, and some bling-bling earrings. Mom came by with some much needed cash, and some clothes. Not too shabby.

I'm hungry and my running late for me B-day dinner. Lates.
Oh.. and none of you bitches said anything or sent anything... fuckers!

Ah Ha! Bitches! My house is still standing, however, the lake in my backyard has overflowed into my lawn. My dock is barely visible. The wind has blown the back door to my porch in. And NO!, I didn't evacuate, I stayed up all night watching the wind destroy my neighbors houses. Every once in a while I would go outside and try to walk against the wind. Why? I have no idea, it's the whole "man vs. nature" thing. I lost a cat during the 1st night. He decided he was going to go out and venture through the neighborhood. He later realized this wasn't too bright and came home soaking wet. All in all, it wasn't too bad. I have no cable, but I'll manage. Lake County is in shambles though, I guess I got pretty lucky. Most of the roads are out of service due to tress and numerous power lines. Eustis looks like a fuckin battlefield. Houses are missing, gas stations look like Godzilla walked on them, 70 foot Oak trees have been ripped out by the roots and thrown about like ragdolls. Anyways, I guess I should go clean up. Aunt Frances left the place a mess, and we're expecting Uncle Ivan anytime. Toodles!

My niggers don't chance it
when it comes to Frances
they just evacuate...
so, go pack
so, go pack

My windows are boarded, my fidge is full of water and other (non)parishable items...I'm ready to wait out my 2nd Hurricane in 3 weeks. Evacuate they say.. but how will I know what a 2x4 sounds like when it impales a human being, as it's being tossed through the air like a dart, by the 100 mph+ force winds? The locals are going crazy, people fighting over water and toilet paper. Did you ever imagine, you would be in such need of toilet paper, that you could raise your fist in fits of rage, as some old lady with a walker, takes the last pack of Charmin.

Well, it's been a while since I last posted. My, how things have changed. Kate and I are doing great in our new place, or "not so new anymore" place. I find that when you grow used to something, the newness sorta wears off. Works good, been pretty fuckin humid around here lately. I've gone beyond the point of being tan, I'd say I'm more of a 2nd generation Mexican color by now. I kinda enjoy being domestic, cooking, cleaning, mowing, all that "married' type shit. As for now, I'm just getting ready for the Hurricane that's headed this way. It should be here in a few hours, so I should get home to Katiebug. Hopefully, the house will still be standing at this time tomorrow. Wish me luck!
I no longer live here. The end.

I'm looking at the key to MY house! The house with the huge backyard overlooking a beautiful lake. A lake where I can relax and watch the sun rise on the right side of the lake, and set to the left. I'm feeling..... I don't know. Anxiety maybe, excitement.. who knows, I like it either way. It's almost surreal, like some foggy dream, I'll soon awake from. It's late, and work comes early, and I still have a ton of things to do before we can actually move into the house. So, off to bed I go. Next time we meet, I'll be looking out over the lake.

Well, it appears that I will soon be out of this house. Kate and I have been looking for places to rent, we found a little 1br/1b house that we could afford. It's kinda nice, lake front property with dock, and a huge backyard. It's nothing I would sport on Cribs, but it's a good house to start out with. I'm really excited about the possibility of getting the house. I think Kate is too. We went out browsing yesterday, trying to get an idea of shit we'll need to get before we could move. Good lord! I never imagined how much I would need, let alone how much money I would have to shell out. But it's cool though, this is a change that's long overdue. I'm really looking forward to it. After saying all that, I found this amusing.. my horoscope for today....

"You have an opportunity now to lay the foundation for a major event in your life. This could be a simple vacation get-away or an educational trip. You might even be planning a change of residence. Whatever it is, it is a big deal. Quite frankly, it doesn't matter whether or not these plans ever really materialize on schedule. What's important is that you dream about them now in a practical manner as if they will happen. Your dreams are important catalysts for change."

I want to write, I can't sleep, and have absolutely nothing to write about. Sure, I could babble on and on about my life, but what's the point? I could go into detail about work, or about my health (or lack there of), I could ramble on about a lot of things, but I won't. Why? Because, that's not me, that's not how I write. I am to words, what Picasso was to paint. I can take words, and create a whole new world. Using just words, I can manipulate the mind of any reader, and make them see what I want them to. I can create the feeling of fear, anger or even love, using just words. I have the ability to make others smile or cry based on what combinations of words I choose to use. I used to find great joy in writing, now I struggle to find the motivation to write. Maybe it's because I no longer have the time, to sit and think, like I used to. Maybe it's 'cause I work 10 hour days, and just too tired to worry about it. Maybe it's due to the fact that I just don't fuckin care anymore. Maybe it's just cause there's nothing to write about... who knows...

It's sappy, but I'm happy to say she's my girl
My life is so good, no need to complain
And as far as Justin, well I haven't changed
I'm demented, resented, and somewhat cynical
Dwigs got issues, but mine are still clinical

I doubt that anyone still keeps up with my journal, but just in case, I suppose I should update. Well, school was a short lived vacation from reality. I was "asked" to leave, or something like that... I'm back in the workforce again, which would explain why I haven't updated as much. I'm doing actual "work" again, 12 hour days type shit. I'm so wore out by the time I get home, I shower, eat, call Kate, and go to bed. Speaking of Kate, we're doing great, we don't see each other as much now, with us both working, but we manage. Well, I'm tired as hell, and have to be up at 6:30, so I'm taking my ass to bed. "fuck you, fuck you, fuck you, you're cool, and fuck you too! I'm out, peace!"

Well guess what I did today...... Kate and I went to Disney. Wow! Not my style, but I had a good time. We went to MGM and Epcot. Rode a few rides, and bitched about the lines and the crowd. (we all know how anti-people I am) Aside from the crowds and the overpriced food, it was a good day. I was picked to be an extra in the Indiana Jones stunt show. I tried to steal the show, and be the center of attention, but they would only allow me to do so much. It was hella fun though. It was nice to go spend a day with Kate, and get a break from reality for a while. Now, I must bring this to an end, I'm horribly exhausted, and have a beautiful girl laying in my bed.... so on that note, I shall take my leave. I bid you all a goodnight.

So yeah, I haven't posted in a while, and if you know me, then you know that means everything is good in my life. School's going great, a lot easier than I had imagined it would be. My love life is absolutely excellent. Kate is a joy to have in my life, such a wonderful person. I could go on and on about her forever. She's probably the reason I haven't posted as much. She keeps a smile on my face, and that's all that matters. And on that note, I'm off to bed.
*sidenote...tonight was perfect!

I'm counting rainbows I can't see
As the rain pours down on me
And all my sorrow

I'm counting on dreams that could be
As I'm pushed into the lead
No one to follow

I'm counting on friends to show the way
As the truth in what they say
Is hard to swallow

I'm counting stars during the day
As the sun washes away
Into tomorrow

A dead end, is often a welcomed relief from the 6 lane highway of life, we usually travel. The simplistic solitude of the dead end is comforting. No confusing lights, no enraged motorists, no fatal crashes, and no traffic jams. Tucked away from distraction, we can peacefully reflect on the roads we've taken to lead us to this destination. However, we have a tendency to  lose ourselves in the comforting embrace of the dead end street. We become so consumed by comfort and convenience, that we no longer realize, the road we're on, leads directly into a neverending abyss of nothing. Blinded by the mind's misconceptions, we ignorantly strive for progress on a path that can go no further. Frustration fuels both anger and embarrassment, as yet another path draws to a close. To error is human, to learn from those errors is divine. When searching for forward progression, I now know, a dead end road, isn't a very good place to start after all.

I sit in the corner, with my party hat on. All alone holding a cupcake, with a candle in the center. The flame on the candle flickers in the darkness. "happy birthday to me..   happy birthday to me............"

*Click!* I hang up the phone. In mere seconds my mind wanders back to the conversation that just ended. The sound of her voice still echos through my ears. I Soon find myself engulfed by the thought of her. I never thought I would be able to "hear" someone smile. It only takes a slight change in her voice, to let me know I'm making her smile. With each word that softly rolls off her lips, another part of me falls harder for her. She can make me feel better about myself, without being in the same room. She can bring an everlasting smile to my face, without saying a word. She can effortlessly make me laugh til my cheeks hurt. She challenges my mind on an intellectual level. Using witty humor, common sense, and learned intelligence, she forces me into thinking situations. And when my line of thinking does happen to take a negative turn, it's her positive reinforcements, that drive me to move ahead. Her eyes are very inviting, but it was her smile that caught my attention. Her words started winning me over, but it was her personality that pushed me over the edge. However, it was her heart that padded my fall. As I lied in her arms, and gazed into her eyes, it dawned on me,.. she is the girl I want and need in my life. She calls to let me know that I'm in her thoughts, and that she misses me, and cares about me. She supports me, for the person I am. But she believes in me, for the person I will one day become. Just being around her has become habit forming. She's like a drug that I can't get enough of. I'm addicted to her. She's an awesome person, I only hope I can bring a smile to her face the way she does to mine. Having Kate as part of my every day life now, has played a huge role in my quest for happiness. Like a lighthouse to a passing by sailor, her words helped to point me in the right direction, and away from danger. If she weren't in my life, I'm not sure where I would be. Without her, I would be lost. She's showered me with compassion, kindness, and understanding. And because of this, it's really hard not to love her. I find her to be, quite simply, amazing. I would be lying to you if I said I didn't have strong feelings for her. But I would be lying to myself though, if I said I didn't love her.

Quick side note... the people in the chat room, have further proven that stupidity of such an outrageous magnitude is in fact possible by people with apposable thumbs. It honestly amazes me, that so many people can allow their mood to be affected by the words of a complete stranger over the internet. And the continually overused phrase, "I don't care what you people think about me", just shows that you're too weak of a person to overcome your simplistic insecurities. The ignorance you people display in your feeble attempts to defend yourselves, is horrendous. You fail to realize that your useless words aren't equal to that of a Dr. Suess story. You people are like a group of lab rats, placed in that room for my personal entertainment. I recommend a mass suicide, it's the honorable thing to do. It's not like your lives will amount to anything worth living for anyways. You people are sheep! Baaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

So, Saturday was turning out to be just like every other night of my life, sittin at home, watching tv. Dwight called, and within minutes of talking to him, I realized that this wasn't going to be my average Saturday night. Somehow he managed to round up 75$ worth of Citywalk money, and it was burning a hole in his pocket. After rounding up Adam and Jenn, we headed down to pick up Dwight, and then over to Citywalk. Place was fuckin packed. Nothing really exciting going on though, we just walked around and laughed at dumb shit. Adam was ripped when we got there, in true alcoholic fashion. Met up with some of Dwight's friends, and sat around chillin with them. Just as the night began to wear down, and it seemed like it was going to be a relatively uneventful night, something unexpected happened. I'm not quite sure how, or why, but a fight broke out right behind us, between a bouncer and a customer. The two guys involved, lost their balance in the ruckus, and proceeded to topple over into some people we were with. Within seconds, cops swarmed the area, and subdued the guy with a few shots of the taser. I bet he wishes he had never grabbed that bouncer now. Dumbass! By this time, it was after 2am, so we left. Adam, Jenn, and myself, finally rolled into the house around 3:30. Adam hung out for a little while, drunk ass almost passed out. After he left, Jenn and I sat around and discussed life and the many aspects of it. Jenn finally opened up to me, it was such a relief. It's hard to see a friend trying to cope with the same depression, that you went through just a few months earlier. I'm actually really concerned about her. I know how it feels to hit rock bottom. Hopefully, I can use the knowledge I've gained through my personal expirences with depression, to help Jenn out of this negative rut. Jenn's a very strong person. I know she'll get through this. She just needs a little positive reinforcement, and good friends to be there for her in times of need. And whether she likes it or not, I'll be behind her, kicking her ass back to happiness, for as long as it takes to get there. I'll be there to support her, encourage her, and tell her the truth even if it may hurt. But when it's all said and done, I'll be the first to embrace her in open arms, letting her know, I care. Why would I do this? Cause, I AM a good friend.

So get this. My 11 year old cousin was arrested, that's right, arrested. On felony charges, no less. It's a situation being blown way out of proportion by some uptight bitch. Apparently, he was standing at his bus stop, throwing Ritz crackers. I guess one of them happened to hit her car when she drove by. What did she do, she pressed charges against an 11 year old boy. But, better yet, the good 'ol Lake County Sheriff's Officer, picked him up at school, in front of his friends, and took him to the jail, where he was printed and put in a holding cell. To top it off, they charged him with "projecting a deadly missle into a moving vehicle". What IN THE FUCK is that shit!? Since when is a fuckin Ritz cracker a "deadly missle"? I would like to commend the LCS's office on a job well done. Dumbassess!! You make the cast of Reno 9-1-1 look like model officers. A county full of Barney Fifes...

brought to you by . wanna know your livejournal's mood ring color? enter your username and hit the button.
Why do I feel this way? Is it even real? Is it even possible? Why do I get sick to my stomach thinking about it? Why? Why? Why? Is it mutual? Doubtful.

I turn deaf ear to the cries of the world around me. With eyes wide shut, I can see the world for what it is. My vision of reality has been distorted. Through dreams, I can escape the sadness of being me. Through songs, I can bring brief joy, to a lonely heart. Through memories, I can smile once again. Through memories, I will shed more tears. Thoughts of, what is, what was, and what could be, engulf me. Self loathing soon becomes comforting. I try too hard, and think too much. But I fail, because I didn't give my all, and my plan wasn't that thought out. I'm a hypocritical contradiction. I'm a jar full of emptiness. In a world where "everybody" is "somebody", I'm just "some guy". Some guy, that's lost in social purgatory.

"A vast ye matey's, tis I, Captain Broadway, of the South Seas." This is the phrase that greeted me, when I answered the phone today. My 15 y/o cousin, finally saw the movie, I guess, and now he won't stop talking like a pirate. I have such a strange family. Anyhow.....the storm we had today, knocked the cable out. I'm so fuckin pissed off. No Simpsons, No LLWS, and I won't get to watch Sportscenter tonight. Grrrr!!!  I had a little black & white tv up here, that I was watching. Old school style with the rabbit ears and all. Needless to say, mom took that so she could watch the News.....Since the cable's out, I've been sitting in here listening to Marley, veggin out, eatin some Chips Ahoy! and milk. Good Stuff!.... well, I have a test tomorrow that I need to study for, so I'm gonna go do that, while I wait for Katiebug to call. Later!

Ghostly images can be seen in the same mirror, where fingerprints are smudged. Memories hang from the mantle, where stockings were hung last Christmas. Clothes still cover the untidy floor, along with forgotton goals, and shattered dreams. Voices of those no longer with us, reassure us that all will be alright. Everything reminds us of something, and it only takes a something, to make us shed a tear. It's funny, how something that can take a lifetime to build, can be destroyed in mere minutes. True friendships can transcend the boundaries of time and space. Though you are gone, you could never be forgotton. I can no longer see the joy upon your face, but I will always be able to feel the comfort of your presence....

Another person I hold dear to my heart has passed away this week. Darren, who I've been close with for 12 years, died early Wed. morning. It saddens me greatly, that he's no longer around. He's now the image of what happens when someone chooses to drink and drive. Some of you may recall, that I had a cousin pass away, just a little over a week ago. Wrecked his brand new crotch rocket, and never made it out of surgery. One man 23, another just 21. Both men taken down in their prime, It hardly seems fair. The week's events have been the driving force behind much of the in depth soul searching, I have been doing. I was hoping the rest of the week would go ok. Wrong! I had to break plans with Kate last night. Man, that pisses me off to no end, cause it was an encounter I was really lookin forward to. So come today,I get up, everything seems normal. Adam, Paul, Myself, and My father went and played 18 holes of gold today, sounds like fun, right? Not in the least. I'm not only suffering from sleep deprivation, but my body aches and cramps, as it cries out for some much needed rest. But, there is one thing, that takes the cake.... I have to be at work at 4pm... here it is 3:30. Talk about adding insult to injury... I'm just so tired, both emotionally and physically wore out. So, yeah, this week sucked for the most part, but you know what they say. "Tomorrow's always a new day.."

I have an old friend, who I seldom talk to anymore. I love her to death, our schedules just conflict. I really enjoy talking to her, but at the same time, I hate it. Talking just makes me miss her, and I dread saying "goodbye", 'cause I never know when we'll talk again. Why are the good ones, so few and far between?
